name: DGS Tumblr Menu Icons
description: Tumblr Menu Icons, themed with characters and artwork from Dai Gyakuten Saiban. Two versions.
additional_info: they only released official (high-res) art for 6 characters (unless there are more available for the other characters but i'm not risking getting spoiled lol) so i'm missing one for the 7th slot and that's why i'm using the cover art i hope all's cool
